replies.body: I see a few threads on this, though there weren't issues with the server during the time period.  Is this still an issue?

Hey Juicepop12345, 

It seems that there may be some Comcast/ISP-related issues at this time. Can you provide more information about what ISP you're using and what geographical location you're in (ie. Northern California)?

Comcast...
Southeastern part of America... (Not giving away my location)(even the state)
